LanguageData.VFEM2_2x1CastleDoor.label: castle door (medium)
LanguageData.VFEM2_2x1CastleDoor.description: An incredibly resistant door made out of oversized stone blocks. Very slow to build. It’s a good choice if you want to keep the enemies out - or in. The door requires walls on either side to function.
LanguageData.VFEM2_3x1CastleDoor.label: castle door (large)
LanguageData.VFEM2_3x1CastleDoor.description: An incredibly resistant door made out of oversized stone blocks. Very slow to build. It’s a good choice if you want to keep the enemies out - or in. The door requires walls on either side to function.
LanguageData.VFEM2_4x1CastleDoor.label: castle door (grand)
LanguageData.VFEM2_4x1CastleDoor.description: An incredibly resistant door made out of oversized stone blocks. Very slow to build. It’s a good choice if you want to keep the enemies out - or in. The door requires walls on either side to function.
LanguageData.VFEM2_2x1CastleGate.label: castle gate (medium)
LanguageData.VFEM2_2x1CastleGate.description: An incredibly resistant door made out of oversized stone blocks, with a latticed grille protecting the passage. Very slow to build. It’s a good choice if you want to keep the enemies out - or in. The door requires walls on either side to function. Castle gates take a long time to open.
LanguageData.VFEM2_3x1CastleGate.label: castle gate (large)
LanguageData.VFEM2_3x1CastleGate.description: An incredibly resistant door made out of oversized stone blocks, with a latticed grille protecting the passage. Very slow to build. It’s a good choice if you want to keep the enemies out - or in. The door requires walls on either side to function. Castle gates take a long time to open.
LanguageData.VFEM2_4x1CastleGate.label: castle gate (grand)
LanguageData.VFEM2_4x1CastleGate.description: An incredibly resistant door made out of oversized stone blocks, with a latticed grille protecting the passage. Very slow to build. It’s a good choice if you want to keep the enemies out - or in. The door requires walls on either side to function. Castle gates take a long time to open.
